info.readme:
This package will install the uSkinned Victorious Starter Kit.

After installation completes the content area will contain some example website content to get you started.

You will see a green 'Finish' button appear when your theme has been installed successfully. Please be patient as this process can take some time to complete.

WARNING: THIS STARTER KIT MUST BE INSTALLED ON A CLEAN VERSION OF UMBRACO WITH NO OTHER STARTER KITS OR WEBSITES PREVIOUSLY INSTALLED OR CONFIGURED.

THIS STARTER KIT IS NOT COMPATIBLE WITH UMBRACO V8.

USNAdvancedPage.pageSummary: This is a demo of an Advanced Page and its available components.

USN_SC_Text_AN.textSection:
Advanced Page

Here we demo some of the components that can be added to an advanced page. You can add, edit, remove and sort these components via the CMS.

USN_SC_Code_AN.introductionText:
The weather widget demonstrates a possible usage of the "Code Section" page component. You can use this component to add third party widgets as demonstarted below.

The below widget is provided by forecast.io

USNBlogLandingPage.bodyText: Welcome to our Blog. Your one stop shop to keep up to date with all the latest goings on!!

USNBlogAuthor.authorBio: Marc Love is an Umbraco Certified Master. He is a co-founder of uSkinned, the world’s number one provider of Umbraco CMS themes and starter kits.

USN_AC_TextSlideshow_AN.text: Each component is packed with settings and configuration options that will let you take full control of your content.

Info.Name: Accordion/Tab Item
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Accordion/Tab" to this section.

Info.Name: Accordion/Tabs
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Accordion" or "Tabbed" section to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Accordion/Tabs

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Advanced Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Advanced Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Subpage listing link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Sub navigation link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Advanced Page

To add content to this page you are required to add components to the "Components" folder directly below this page.

By adding new components you will be able to organise the layout and content of this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Listing image
GenericProperty.Description:
Listing image is only displayed if this page appears on a "Sub Page Listing".
Focal point is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Page summary
GenericProperty.Description: Summary text is only displayed if this page appears on a "Subpage Listing".

Info.Name: Advanced Page Blog Post
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Advanced Page Blog Post".

GenericProperty.Name: Categories
GenericProperty.Description: If selecting a child category make sure you also select the parent categories.

GenericProperty.Name: Disable comments
GenericProperty.Description: Tick this box to disable commenting for this post. This is only relevant if you have entered a "Disqus username" within the "Global Settings" node > "General Settings" tab.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Advanced Page Blog Post

To add content to this page you are required to add components to the "Components" folder directly below this page.

By adding new components you will be able to organise the layout and content of this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Listing image
GenericProperty.Description: Focal point is defined within your "Media" section.

Info.Name: Advanced Page Components Folder
Info.Description: This item is added automatically to "Advanced Pages" to organise your page components.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Components

Add components below this folder to organise the layout and content of your page.

The order of your components within this folder directly relates to the order your components will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your components.

DO NOT delete this folder.

GenericProperty.Name: Background image
GenericProperty.Description: No recommended image size. To cover the full area of the component use a large image. Use a small image to repeat.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description: These settings only apply if this component has been added to the "Homepage" or an "Advanced Page / Advanced Page Blog Post".

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description:
Color selected will dictate the color to be used for any text.
If a background image is used, select the color that works best for the text over the image.

Info.Name: Alert Box
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Alert Box" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Alert Box

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Banner
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Banner" to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Add color overlay
GenericProperty.Description: If “Yes” is selected a semi transparent block of the background color is added over your image.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Your heading hierarchy is important for SEO. This will not affect font size.

GenericProperty.Name: Video
GenericProperty.Description: MP4 format only. Image above will display until video loads. Small file size recommended for quick downloads.

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description: Focal point is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Content
GenericProperty.Description: Content

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description:
Color selected will dictate the color to be used for any text.
If a background image is used, select the color that works best for the text over the image.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description: The "Caption" field will be used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Settings
GenericProperty.Description: Settings

GenericProperty.Name: Name
GenericProperty.Description: The name you enter is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Banners
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Banners" section to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Banners

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Auto rotate speed
GenericProperty.Description: A value of 0 will stop auto rotation.

Info.Name: Blockquote Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blockquote Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blockquote Pod

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Blog Author
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Author".

GenericProperty.Name: Author page
GenericProperty.Description:
Use this to link to the authors page which could be an external blog or a page on this website. If something is entered here the authors name on blog listings and blog post pages will link to this page.
The 'Caption' field will be ignored however you must enter something in order to save this link.

GenericProperty.Name: Author bio
GenericProperty.Description: The author bio will appear below every blog post associated with this author and should contain a short snippet about the author.

GenericProperty.Name: Author image
GenericProperty.Description: Focal point is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Author

The node name you enter above will be used for the "Author Name" displayed on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Icon shape
GenericProperty.Description: Choose the style that will be applied to your social icon links.

Info.Name: Blog Authors Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to organise the "Blog Authors".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Authors

Create items below this folder to add new "Blog Authors".

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Blog Categories Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to organise the "Blog Categories".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Categories

Create items below this folder to add new "Blog Categories".

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Blog Category Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Category".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Category

The node name you enter above will be used for the "Category Name" displayed on the website.

This page will list all blog posts that have been added to this category.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

Info.Name: Blog Landing Page
Info.Description: Use this item to create a "Blog Landing Page".

GenericProperty.Name: Summary text character count
GenericProperty.Description:
Enter the number of characters you would like displayed from the beginning of each blog article.
If summary text has been entered this will be used instead. Summary text must be entered on Advanced page blog posts for this to be displayed. If nothing is entered, no summary text will be displayed.

GenericProperty.Name: Default author
GenericProperty.Description: Select the default author that will be applied to all blog posts.

GenericProperty.Name: Page layout
GenericProperty.Description:
Default page layout will be displayed if nothing is selected.
If 'Wide' is selected sub navigation will be hidden.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Landing Page

This page will list your "Blog Posts". "Blog Posts" are added to this section via the "Posts" folder directly below this page.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

Info.Name: Blog Month Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Month Folder".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Month Folder

This folder is created automatically based on your blog posts.

Below this folder you will find your "Blog Posts".

"Blog Posts" must be added to the "Blog Posts Folder" above.

Info.Name: Blog Posts Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to organise the"Blog Posts".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Posts Folder

Add your "Blog Posts" below this folder. "Year" and "Month" folders are created automatically based on your "Blog post date".

Your "Blog Post" will be moved into the correct folder when saved.

DO NOT delete or rename this folder.

Info.Name: Blog RSS
Info.Description: Use this item to create your "Blog RSS Feed".

GenericProperty.Name: Blog posts to return
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered here all posts available will be listed.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog RSS

This page will display the RSS feed for your blog posts.

Info.Name: Blog Year Folder
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Blog Year Folder".

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Blog Year Folder

This folder is created automatically based on your blog posts.

Below this folder you will find "Month" folders containing your "Blog Posts".

"Blog Posts" must be added to the "Blog Posts Folder" above.

Info.Name: Call to Action Strip
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Call to Action Strip" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Background image
GenericProperty.Description: No recommended image size. To cover the full area of the component use a large image. Use a small image to repeat.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description: Color selected will dictate the color to be used for any text. If a background image is used, select the color that works best for the text over the image.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description: The "Caption" field will be used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Your heading hierarchy is important for SEO. This will not affect font size.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Call to Action Strip

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Code Block
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Code Block" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Code
GenericProperty.Description: Enter your raw code here. This can be JavaScript, HTML etc.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Code Block

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Info.Name: Code Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Code Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Code
GenericProperty.Description: Enter your raw code here. This can be JavaScript, HTML etc.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions

Code Pod

GenericProperty.Description: If set to yes, this will add a maximum width to the overall site content.

GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered, blog commenting will be disabled.

GenericProperty.Name: Website logo
GenericProperty.Description: We suggest that you use an image of at least 240 pixels in height. This is to ensure your logo is ready for both retina and non-retina displays.

GenericProperty.Name: Favicon and touch icons
GenericProperty.Description: This image will be used for your website favicon and device bookmarks. We suggest that you use an image of at least 310x310 pixels.

GenericProperty.Name: Website name
GenericProperty.Description: The text entered here will be be added to the default Meta title of your webpages and used for the hidden text behind your website logo.

GenericProperty.Name: Search results page
GenericProperty.Description: If no page is selected the search form will not appear.

GenericProperty.Description: Anything you enter here will be placed before the closing </body> tag on every page of your website.

GenericProperty.Name: After opening body scripts
GenericProperty.Description: Anything you enter here will be placed after the opening <body> tag on every page of your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Header scripts
GenericProperty.Description:
Anything you enter here will be placed before the closing </head> tag on every page of your website.
Example usage would be for entering Google Analytics Script code.

GenericProperty.Name: Default Subscriber list ID
GenericProperty.Description: Newsletter Signup will only be available if a Subscriber List ID is available. Individual signup forms can have their own Subscriber List ID however the one entered here will be used as the default.

GenericProperty.Name: Email marketing platform
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is selected Newsletter Signup will not be available.

GenericProperty.Name: API key
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered Newsletter Signup will not be available.

GenericProperty.Name: Google reCAPTCHA V2 secret key
GenericProperty.Description: Google reCAPTCHA V2 will be displayed on Contact Forms and Newsletter Signup Forms if a site key and secret key have been entered here.

GenericProperty.Name: Google reCAPTCHA V2 site key
GenericProperty.Description:
Google reCAPTCHA V2 will be displayed on Contact Forms and Newsletter Signup Forms if a site key and secret key have been entered here.
<a href="https://www.google.com/recaptcha/" target="_blank">https://www.google.com/recaptcha/<a/>

Resusable Components

Add items below this folder to create "Resusable Components" that will be available for display on all pages you create.

The "Reusable Content" tab within "Global Settings" is used to control the default footer components that will be added to your pages.

The "Reusable Content" tab on each page node can be used to override the default footer components that have been selected.

These items can also be added to a page by adding a "Reusable Components Section".

Info.Name: Robots TXT
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Robots TXT" to your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Robots TXT

This page controls your websites robots.txt file.

Make sure you have the following rewrite rule included in web.config. Text in bold should match your page link.

<rewrite>
        <rules>
            <rule name="Robots TXT" stopProcessing="true">
                <match url="robots.txt" />
                <action type="Rewrite" url="robots-txt" />
            </rule>
        </rules>
    </rewrite>

IIS URL Rewrite module must be installed on your webserver to use this feature.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap XML location
GenericProperty.Description: This will add sitemap xml instructions to your robots.txt file.

GenericProperty.Name: Before closing body scripts
GenericProperty.Description: Anything you enter here will be placed before the closing </body> tag on this page of your website.

GenericProperty.Name: Header scripts
GenericProperty.Description: Anything you enter here will be placed before the closing </head> tag on this page of your website.

GenericProperty.Name: After opening body scripts
GenericProperty.Description: Anything you enter here will be placed after the opening <body> tag on this page of your website.

GenericProperty.Description:
Search Results Page

This page displays a listing of your search results.

GenericProperty.Name: Sitemap link text
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

GenericProperty.Name: Alternative URL
GenericProperty.Description:
Use this field to provide multiple URLs for a content node.
For example if you were to enter "examplepage1,examplepage2/this-is-a-test", this would resolve the following URLs to the same page.
/examplepage1/ /examplepage2/this-is-a-test/
Please note that the values you use must be lowercase, not use a leading slash and not use a file extension.

GenericProperty.Name: Web page title
GenericProperty.Description:
This is shown in search engines, web browsers and when the page is shared via social media. If left empty the default page title will be used.
The default page title will be a combination of the current page node name and the website name defined in "Global Settings".

GenericProperty.Name: Open Graph image
GenericProperty.Description:
The image used when someone shares the page on social media, such as, Twitter or Facebook.
We suggest that you use an image of at least 1200x630 pixels.
If nothing is uploaded here the "Default Open Graph image" from your "Global Settings" will be used.

GenericProperty.Name: Hide from search engines
GenericProperty.Description: This will add a noindex meta tag to your page and exclude this page from your sitemap.xml

GenericProperty.Name: Twitter creator username
GenericProperty.Description: Username for the content creator/author used in the twitter card.

GenericProperty.Name: Meta description
GenericProperty.Description: This is shown in search engines, when the page is shared via social media and in your sites own search results. Try to keep this below 155 characters.

GenericProperty.Description:
Components

Add components below this folder to organise the layout and content of your page.

The order of your components within this folder directly relates to the order your components will be displayed on this page. Use Actions > Sort to reorder your components.

DO NOT delete this folder.

GenericProperty.Name: Main image
GenericProperty.Description: Focal point is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Page title
GenericProperty.Description: Node name will be used by default if nothing is entered.

Info.Name: Subpage Listing
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Subpage Listing" to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Subpage listing

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Link to listing
GenericProperty.Description:
Link to internal pages that contain sub pages. Each page you select containing sub pages will be displayed along with a menu to switch between them.
If linking to a "Blog", either link to the "Blog Landing Page" or "Blog Category Page".
Links to external pages will be ignored.
The "Caption" field is used for the tab heading and link to each listing.

GenericProperty.Name: Pages to display
GenericProperty.Description: If nothing is entered here all pages available will be listed.

GenericProperty.Name: Summary text character count
GenericProperty.Description:
Enter the number of characters you would like displayed from the beginning of each page.
If summary text has been entered this will be used instead. Summary text must be entered on Advanced pages for this to be displayed. If nothing is entered, no summary text will be displayed.

Info.Name: Text
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Text" section to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Text

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

Use this item to add text between other components you have added to the page.

Info.Name: Text/Slideshow
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "Text/Slideshow" section to your page.

GenericProperty.Name: Text position
GenericProperty.Description: Display text before or after the video or image.

GenericProperty.Name: Background color
GenericProperty.Description:
Color selected will dictate the color to be used for any text.
If a background image is used, select the color that works best for the text over the image.

GenericProperty.Name: Background image
GenericProperty.Description: No recommended image size. To cover the full area of the component use a large image. Use a small image to repeat.

GenericProperty.Name: Heading
GenericProperty.Description: Your heading hierarchy is important for SEO. This will not affect font size.

GenericProperty.Name: Link
GenericProperty.Description: The "Caption" field will be used for your link text.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions
GenericProperty.Description:
Text/Slideshow

The node name you enter above is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Submit via AJAX
GenericProperty.Description:
Select 'Yes' if you would like your form to submit without a full page refresh.
Please note, your form must have a single page setup and 'Go to page' must be empty for AJAX submissions.

Info.Name: Video
Info.Description: Use this item to add a new "YouTube" or "Vimeo" video to this section.

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description:
Focal point is defined within your "Media" section.
This image is optional. If you do not upload an image, a thumbnail image will be automatically generated for you from the associated video.

GenericProperty.Name: Name
GenericProperty.Description: The name you enter is for your reference only and will not appear on the website.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window title
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed above your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window footer
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed below your image within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Video
GenericProperty.Description: Copy the full URL for your video from the address bar. (YouTube or Vimeo only)

Info.Name: Video Pod
Info.Description: Use this item to create a new "Video Pod".

GenericProperty.Name: Image
GenericProperty.Description:
This image is optional. If you do not upload an image, a thumbnail image will be automatically generated for you from the associated video.
Focal point of the image is defined within your "Media" section.

GenericProperty.Name: Video
GenericProperty.Description: Copy the full URL for your video from the address bar. (YouTube or Vimeo only)

GenericProperty.Name: Light window footer
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed below your video within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Light window title
GenericProperty.Description: This text will be displayed above your video within the light window.

GenericProperty.Name: Instructions

DO NOT delete this item.

@inherits UmbracoViewPage @{ Layout = null; } @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_SEOPageHead", Model) @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_InternalStyles", Model) @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_Icons", Model) @RenderSection("Head", false) @Html.Partial("USNMiscPageElements/USN_NotificationDurationVariable", Model) @Html.Partial("USNWebsiteHeadSection/USN_HeaderScripts", Model) @Html.Partial("USNMiscPageElements/USN_AfterOpeningBodyScripts", Model) Skip to the content

}

@Html.Partial("USNNavigation/USN_Breadcrumb", Model) @if(!Model.Content.GetPropertyValue("hideWebsiteFooterSection")) {

@Html.Partial("USNMiscPageElements/USN_ContactInformation")
@Html.Partial("USNNavigation/USN_SocialLinks", Model)

}

*{outline:0 none !important}.slick-list{position:relative;overflow:hidden;display:block;margin:0;padding:0}.slick-list:focus{outline:none}.slick-list.dragging{cursor:pointer;cursor:hand}.slick-slider .slick-list,.slick-track,.slick-slide,.slick-slide img{-webkit-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);-moz-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);-ms-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);-o-transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);transform:translate3d(0, 0, 0);z-index:0}.slick-track{position:relative;left:0;top:0;display:block;zoom:1}.slick-track:before,.slick-track:after{content:"";display:table}.slick-track:after{clear:both}.slick-loading .slick-track{visibility:hidden}.slick-slide{float:left;height:100%;min-height:1px;display:none}.slick-slide img{display:block}.slick-slide.slick-loading img{display:none}.slick-slide.dragging img{pointer-events:none}.slick-initialized .slick-slide{display:block}.slick-loading .slick-slide{visibility:hidden}.slick-vertical li{position:relative;display:inline-block;height:20px;width:20px;margin:0 5px;padding:0;cursor:pointer}.slick-dots li button{border:0;background:transparent;display:block;height:20px;width:20px;outline:none;line-height:0;font-size:0;color:transparent;padding:5px;cursor:pointer}.slick-dots li button:hover,.slick-dots li button:focus{outline:none}.slick-dots li button:hover:before,.slick-dots li button:focus:before{opacity:1}.slick-dots li button:before{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;width:20px;height:20px;font-size:6px;line-height:20px;text-align:center;color:black;opacity:0.25;-webkit-font-smoothing:antialiased;-moz-osx-font-smoothing:grayscale}.slick-dots li.slick-active button:before{color:black;opacity:0.75}.ekko-lightbox-container{position:relative}.ekko-lightbox-nav-overlay{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;z-index:100;width:100%;height:100%}.ekko-lightbox-nav-overlay a{width:49%;height:100%;z-index:100;display:block}.ekko-lightbox .ion-chevron-left{float:left}.ekko-lightbox .ion-chevron-right{float:right}.ekko-lightbox-nav-overlay a::before{position:absolute;top:50%;z-index:100;display:block;width:50px;height:50px;font-size:20px;text-align:center;line-height:52px !important;color:#fff;background-color:#ec1b47;transform:translateY(-50%);transition:background-color 0.3s ease-in-out 0s}.ekko-lightbox-nav-overlay .ion-chevron-left::before{left:0}.ekko-lightbox-nav-overlay a.ion-chevron-right::before{right:0}html.no-touch .ekko-lightbox-nav-overlay a:hover::before{text-decoration:none;color:#fff;background-color:#db123d}.ekko-lightbox .modal-footer{text-align:left}.modal-backdrop.in{opacity:0.85;background-color:#000}.ekko-lightbox .modal-content{box-shadow:none;border-radius:0;border:none;background-color:transparent}.ekko-lightbox .modal-header{border:0;padding-left:0;padding-right:0}.ekko-lightbox .modal-header .close{opacity:0.5;color:#fff;text-shadow:0;margin-top:-10px;font-size:30px}.ekko-lightbox .modal-header .close:hover{opacity:1}.ekko-lightbox .modal-header h4.modal-title{color:#fff;padding:0}.ekko-lightbox .modal-body{padding:0}.ekko-lightbox .modal-footer{opacity:0.9;border:0;color:#fff;padding:0;margin:16px 0}.ekko-lightbox-nav-overlay a{opacity:0.9;text-shadow:none}.ekko-lightbox .modal-dialog{padding:15px}.ekko-lightbox{padding:60px 15px 15px;margin:0 auto;width:auto}.ekko-lightbox .modal-header,.ekko-lightbox .modal-body,.ekko-lightbox .modal-content,.ekko-lightbox .modal-footer,.ekko-lightbox .modal-dialog{min-width:100%;padding:0;margin:0 auto}.ekko-lightbox .modal-header{padding:10px 0}.ekko-lightbox
